name: Untitled (Blue Lapis Lazuli over Yellow)
description:
Part of a collection of color field items, this Untitled piece is about the unending quest for human perfection and the juxtaposition of its constant failure.

On the one hand the Renaissance's artistic perfection, represented by an artwork entirely painted in Blue Lapis Lazuli. On the other – from above a light that illuminates it, revealing all the defects and surface imperfections.

That light is a siren call for viewers not to connect with the irrelevant, formal, surface qualities of the work, but to open our minds up to a truly intimate, fully human experience with the unknown.
